short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate random equations with answers - linear, simultaneous and quadratic.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an equation generator created in Sinhala language for the students and teachers in Sri Lanka. 
It can generate linear, simultaneous and quadratic equations at random with the click of a button. The answer for each question is generated at the same time. 
It can generate large number of questions.
